channel.title: Join lines action request
channel.description:
A one-button way to turn all lines in a draft into a single paragraph would be useful.
Primary use case is turning a PDF, or other source that divides text into multiple lines, into something that reads smoothly with a screen reader or text-to-speech functionality.
A screen reader doesn’t need paragraphs for readability, so all one paragraph would be fine and the most efficient method toward the desired end.
Many thanks, Tim 16,368 days
